content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's my pleasure to show you the apartment. I'm sure you'll find it quite comfortable and convenient, given its central location and modern amenities. How much are you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student, so I am on a tight budget. I was thinking about 400 Euro per month, including all the utility costs.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that's quite low for the location and the standard of the apartment. The average rent for a one-bedroom apartment in the city center is around 650 Euro per month. I'm sure you understand that I need to cover my expenses and make a reasonable profit. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I can understand that you need to make a profit. But as I said, I am on a tight budget. How about 500 Euro per month? I can also sign a two-year contract to provide you with a stable tenant.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 500 Euro per month is still below market value, and I'm not sure I can accept that. However, your offer of a two-year contract is interesting. If you're willing to pay 550 Euro per month with a two-year contract, I might be able to consider it. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a more reasonable offer. However, I still cannot afford 550 Euro per month. How about 525 Euro per month with a two-year contract? I am a dependable and responsible tenant, and I am sure you will not have any problems with me during the lease period.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hmm, 525 Euro per month is closer to what I'm looking for, but still not quite there. If you can meet me at 550 Euro per month with a two-year contract, I think we can have a deal. It's a good price for the apartment's location and quality. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [525 Euro] Euro! I believe it is a fair price for a student like me. I am a smart and responsible person, and I will take good care of the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept 525 Euro per month. The apartment is in high demand, and I have other potential tenants who are willing to pay closer to the market rate. If you're not willing to pay 550 Euro per month with a two-year contract, I'll have to consider their offers.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you are asking for is higher than my budget allows. I am a student and I need to save money for my studies. Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your situation, but as a landlord, I have to ensure that I'm getting a fair market price for my property. If you change your mind or can offer a higher price, feel free to contact me. Good luck with your search for a suitable apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your time and consideration. I appreciate your professionalism. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
